short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display time in local timezone on Jenkins

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display time in different timezone on Jenkins instead of always showing UTC time. In this version we support the following timezones:

* Taipei Time (UTC+0800)
* UTC
* US Pacific Time (UTC+0800 or UTC+0700), depends on daylight saving time

and languages en-US and zh-TW.

Change logs:

* 1.0: initial commit
* 1.1: remove waiting for onload event
* 1.2: fix typo from "Jeknins" to "Jenkins" 
* 1.3: enable in https
